feature.label: Eclipse Workbench Developer Tools
feature.description:
This feature adds a set of development tools for the Eclipse IDE environment to make it more useful for developers.
Stripped Java Browsing: new variant of the Java Browsing perspective that uses standalone views to maximize available real-estate.
Adds new Naviate > Open Method... and Open Field... dialogs that does for methods and fields what Open Type does for types (not bound by default).
Allows toggling line numbers on and off (not bound by default).
Allows opening an editor in a new window (not bound by default).
